about_the_game:
Unlocks R18 contents in LOVE³ -Love Cube-.

Cautions



  • All-age version and R18 version do not share save data. With R18 applied, save data from all-age version will not be listed, and vice versa. Since save data of two versions are not compatible, they are located in different folders.
  • If you take a screenshot of R18 scenes by pressing F12 as provided by Steam, mosaic will be applied to the screenshot.
  • The game will not support Steam streaming. The game will quit itself if streaming is attempted. In order to prevent a reset from happening unexpectedly, we recommend turning off broadcast streaming, or only allowing certain users to watch your streaming.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Animated erotic scenes 
- Bath scene uncensored and will show nipples
- Sleeping together scene shows nipples
- With mosaic

detailed_description:
Unlocks R18 contents in LOVE³ -Love Cube-.

Cautions



  • All-age version and R18 version do not share save data. With R18 applied, save data from all-age version will not be listed, and vice versa. Since save data of two versions are not compatible, they are located in different folders.
  • If you take a screenshot of R18 scenes by pressing F12 as provided by Steam, mosaic will be applied to the screenshot.
  • The game will not support Steam streaming. The game will quit itself if streaming is attempted. In order to prevent a reset from happening unexpectedly, we recommend turning off broadcast streaming, or only allowing certain users to watch your streaming.
